Title: The Flight of the Eagle
Writer: Klaus Rifbjerg (screenplay), Ian Rakoff (screenplay), Jan Troell (screenplay), Georg Oddner (screenplay), Per Olof Sundman (freely adapted from the novel by)
Actors: Max von Sydow, Sverre Anker Ousdal, Göran Stangertz, Eva von Hanno
Plot: The Swedish 19th century engineer S. A. Andrée sets out to become the first man on the north pole. His idea is to launch a polar expedition using a hydrogen balloon, together with two friends. The balloon, "The Eagle", takes off from Svalbard in 1897, but the three men are not heard of again.
Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 1 win & 1 nomination.
